result:
<el-row>
    <el-col :span="19" class="left_col">
        <el-table :data="list" :height="theight" :key="tableKey[0]" border cell-class-name="table-cell" fit header-cell-class-name="header-cell" highlight-current-row ref="subList" size="mini" style="width: 100%;">
            <el-table-column align="center" label="操作" prop="organizationCode" show-overflow-tooltip width="80">
                <template slot-scope="scope">
                    <el-button @click="handleDownloadFile(scope.row)" size="small" type="text">下载</el-button> 
                    <el-button @click="handleDeleteFile(scope.row)" size="small" type="text">删除</el-button>
                </template>
            </el-table-column>
            <el-table-column align="center" label="附件类型" prop="fileTypeCN" show-overflow-tooltip width="80"></el-table-column>
            <el-table-column align="center" label="附件类别" prop="categoryCN" show-overflow-tooltip width="80"></el-table-column>
            <el-table-column align="center" label="附件编号" prop="fileCode" show-overflow-tooltip min-width="150"></el-table-column>
            <el-table-column align="center" label="附件名称" prop="fileName" show-overflow-tooltip min-width="150"></el-table-column>
        </el-table>
        <pagination :limit.sync="listQuery.pageSize" :page.sync="listQuery.currentPage" :total="total" @pagination="getList" />
    </el-col>
    <el-col :span="5" :style="{height:theight+43+'px'}" class="right_col">
        <el-form class="small-space" label-position="right" label-width="100px" size="mini">
            <el-form-item :label="titleText" prop="functionCode">
                <el-input :placeholder="titleText" disabled size="small" v-model="temp.functionCode" />
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="附件类型" prop="fileType">
                <el-select clearable disabled placeholder="请选择" size="small" v-model="temp.fileType">
                    <el-option :key="index" :label="item.dictItemValue" :value="item.dictItemKey" v-for="(item,index) in dt_file_type" />
                </el-select>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="附件类别" prop="category">
                <el-select clearable placeholder="请选择" size="small" v-model="temp.category">
                    <el-option :key="index" :label="item.dictItemValue" :value="item.dictItemKey" v-for="(item,index) in categoryData" />
                </el-select>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="附件">
                <el-upload :before-upload="fileLimit" :file-list="fileList" :http-request="uploadFile" :limit="10" :on-change="handleFile" :on-exceed="fileExceed" accept=".xls, .xlsx, .pdf, .docx, .pptx, .txt" action auto-upload class="upload-demo" list-type="text" multiple ref="upload2">
                    <el-button size="small" slot="trigger" type="primary">选取文件</el-button>
                </el-upload>
                <el-button @click="handleUpload" class="filter-item" icon="el-icon-plus" size="small" type="primary">{{ $t('table.upload') }}</el-button>
            </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
    </el-col>
</el-row>
